name: LEGACY (Kynrus)
description:
The product of the 24 Hour Digital Design Challenge, runner up in the popular vote with music awarded "Best of the Night" hosted by the University of Canberra using the following themes...

Blue, Arsenal and Indignation.

Kidnapped by the government you are supposed to trust and almost sacrificed to a creature that roams the mists. You escape, claim an arsenal of weapons and now seek justice  for what they have done. But be careful, the creatures they meant to  feed you to still roam the island...

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

1/2/3 - Alternate Weapons

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Sniper Zoom
